subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Tatum, a former Oakland Raiders player, was known for his brutal hits, none of them more devastating than a blow that left New England Patriots wide receiver Darryl Stingley paralyzed in 1978.
snippet: Mr. Tatum, a former Oakland Raiders player, was known for his brutal hits, none of them more devastating than a blow that left New England Patriots wide receiver Darryl Stingley paralyzed in 1978.
